channel.title: Amazon EKS on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Amazon EKS on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: Amazon EKS
item.description: Running Kubernetes on Amazon EKS Following example will use pharmer to create a Kubernetes cluster with 1 worker node on Amazon EKS. Before you start As a prerequisite, you need to have pharmer installed. To install pharmer run the following command. mkdir -p $(go env GOPATH)/src/github.com/pharmer cd $(go env GOPATH)/src/github.com/pharmer git clone https://github.com/pharmer/pharmer cd pharmer go install -v pharmer -h You also need Guard installed on your local machine.
